docks.__comment_dock_index: To identify which dock in the area. Would use the same number than in the logic data
docks.__comment_connected_dock_index: The type of the connected dock should match this
docks.__comment_weakness_type: Would be an index of the 'Door Weakness' in logic data

pickups.__comment_pickup_index: For when an area has more than one pickup. Alternatively, remove the `location` field and this uses the same index number there currently is.
pickups.__comment_model_index: An index of the following array.
pickups.__comment_scan: What is provided when the pickup is scanned. Does this need a separate model?
pickups.__comment_conditional_resources: Field may not be present. If present, the pickup should always check the condition below when collected.

conditional_resources.__comment_index: The index of the item to check for quantity > 0. If true, give these resources instead.

__comment_pickups: An error is raised if there's a pickup missing from the list.

elevators.__comment_target_location: This location does not necessarily contains an elevator.

__comment_elevators: An error is raised if there's an elevator missing from the list.

translator_gates.__comment_gate_index: For when an area has more than one gate
translator_gates.__comment_translator_index: The item index of the translator needed. The gate's color is updated accordingly.

area_patches.__comment_starting_layer: The idea would be a generic API that allows for things like 'Disable IL cutscene in Hive Chamber B'. If this isn't that usable, see `specific_patches`

specific_patches.__comment_intro_in_post_state: The rooms between Ship and Hive Chamber B are in the state they would be after the player goes through then
specific_patches.__comment_warp_to_start: Adds a user-activated tool that warps the player to Ship (or where the player started this game). Could be from Save Stations or anywhere similar to Menu Mod.
specific_patches.__comment_disable_hud_popup: Removes the Popup when picking an item
